titleInfo.title: Introduction of image-based water transparency descriptors to quantify marine snow and turbidity features. A study with data from a stationary observatory

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Möller, Torben, Nilssen, Ingunn, and Nattkemper, Tim Wilhelm. 2014. “Introduction of image-based water transparency descriptors to quantify marine snow and turbidity features. A study with data from a stationary observatory”. Presented at the MIW 2014 - Marine Imaging Workshop, Southampton .
